reviews.review: отличная игра, в некоторых моментах заставляет подумать. моментов таких не так много, как я ожидал, но, все-таки они есть, как в сингле, так и в коопе. кооп представляет отдельный интерес, именно к нему я обратился изначально, только потом прошел сингл. также, радует обильное количество кастомных карт в воркшопе и встроенный редактор карт, что делает эту игру почти бесконечной для прохождения, опять же, и в сингле, и в коопе, на любой вкус.
Bestes Puzzle Game ever mit guter Singleplayer Story und vielen Multiplayer Leveln. Außerdem quasi unendlich Level durch dem Steam Workshop.
CORE GAME

This game is amazing. The puzzles are well-made. The story is well-developed and clear to follow with a sense of what you have to do. A revolutionary concept to use portals physics in FPS games. Game has the best ending I ever seen in any video game.
Amazing game! The best signle-player and co-op game at all times!!!

Don't like puzzle games? Neither did I... But I bloody love this game to death!!! This has to be one of the best games I've ever played. With a remarkable storyline that keeps you gripped, entertaining (and sometimes frustrating) puzzles to contend with, but overall it's orginality, humour and extensive gameplay that keeps you gripped for HOURS is purely amazing. I was gripped playing this game night after night. 

This has to be an amazing 10/10 score from me!
Macht Laune. Vor allem der Coop Modus.
is rly gud 10/10
Bellissimo puzzle game, ottima grafica, storia intrigante e abbastanza impegnativo, un gioco davvero completo grazie anche alla coop multiplayer. Da acquistare :)

Bloody brilliant.

Superb voice work.  Very funny.  Even better then the first one, which I liked alot.  Beat it with zero hints/wiki help, although I ended up with a headache on a few of them.
Awesome game.
¡Si disfrutaste de "Portal" esta segunda remesa de pruebas y juegos de ingenio no te defraudarán!

El primer juego que compré, celebrando que compré junto a mi hermano una gráfica en condiciones. Juego que me ha dado mucho entretenimiento, y muy muy divertido en el modo cooperativo. Historia exquisita, es impresionante con un tono muy bueno de humor; y el modo cooperativo, si lo juegas con un buen amigo, será una experiencia impresionante a la vez que interesante. Además, tenemos las cámaras de la comunidad que complementan el juego para tener así diversión infinita, tanto para un jugador como para su modo cooperativo. Los 14 euros mejor gastados de mi vida, sinceramente.
Simplesmente o melhor jogo que joguei na Steam até hoje, possui uma história empolgante e, respectivamente, irá fazer você jogar por horas, contando também com o modo Co-op.
10/10,  you cant do wrong move with this great game :-)
le brain chauffe ^_^
Ingenio, puzle, humor negro, o como sea, pero en mi opinion este es un juego que cualquier gamer debe jugar por completo!
nothing to say about it.

This game is one of my favorite games, if not my favorite. It provides an interesting storylne and puzzles that gives you a feeling accomplishment if you stay around to complete them. I recommend this game to anybody who considers playing it.

Where do I even begin? This game is among some of the best I've ever played. It's probably the best sequel for any game series. I strongly recommend this game to anyone who will take the time to grasp the story and truely enjoy the gameplay.
Awesome puzzling adventure game.
This game is an awesome and addictive puzzle sovling game. It also has a decent multiplayer for after you beat the main game.
nice game

Portal 2 ! C'est un jeu emblématique ! Si vous ne l'avez pas ou si vous ni avez jamais jouer je vous inscite a le faire. Il méle un bon scénario a de la réflexion et de la logique.De quoi bien vous occuper si vous ne savez pas quoi faire et si vous chercher un bon jeu.
One of the best puzzle games i've ever played.
Отличная игра! Интересные уровни, как мне кажется, развивают логическое мышление, внимательность и смекалку. Также очень обрадовала возможность играть по сети.

Obra maestra de la historia de los videojuegos.
Tenemos un juego de puzles en la primera parte con una gran historia, esta segunda parte de portal mejora gráficos notablemente, dificultad de puzles y sobretodo duración y historia, dejándonos con la boca abierta cada momento del principio al final.
Entre los modos de los juegos está el Modo Historia, modo Desafío para batir tiempos con tus amigos o tú mismo, Cámaras de la Comunidad donde podremos crear nuestros propios puzles y competir en los de toda la comunidad, muchos extras de los desarrolladores para los más indagadores y freaks, y el Modo Cooperativo donde puedes pasar mucho tiempo haciendo nuevos puzles con un compañero y donde más diversión se puede obtener.
Valve se ha superado con este juegazo, recomendadisimo.

Valve have no bad games when bought didn't expect that it will be cheerful

Jeg plejer normalt at forage puslespil som jeg skamløst leder efter vejledninger til på Youtube, når jeg støder på dem. At et spil derfor udelukkende kan handle om dette og samtidig holde mig fanget og ydermere motivere mig til ikke at snyde mig igennem, er en noget af en bedrift fra Valves side! 
Portal 2 er en unik oplevelse der kræver at man tænker kreativt og ud af boksen. Den har en dragende historie og nogle karakterer man virkelig nyder selskabet med. Alle burde unde sig selv chancen for at prøve Portal serien. 
Udover en fantastisk singleplayer kampagne, har den også en virkelig solid koorperativ kampagne som jeg har gennemført flere gange med forskellige venner. Den tvinger en til at arbejde sammen ved at man kan skal koordinere, lytte til hvad den anden kan se på sin skærm og stole på dem. Den gør ligesom andre Valve spil, at den laver et spil der KRÆVER at man arbejder sammen og ikke blot giver en muligheden.  

10/10
Sem comentários, um jogo excepcional...
beautifully made and presented. challenging and charming, not easy to pull off.

A very well put together and intelectually tough but fun game! If you're looking for a Nice puzzle game with a DESICIVE story line that will keep you on the edge of your seat and keep you playing until the end. Well worth the price they give.

Portal 2 эта игра, этакая смесь Экшена, Приключений и головоломок. Здесь не нужно сражаться, как вы возможно могли подумать в начале, нет здесь нужно не много напрягать мозги, решать головоломки, создавать порталы убегать от разъяренного робота и многое другое. Кооператив-же игры, открывает многие другие возможности, вы проходите совершенно другие испытания и играете за других персонажей. Я думаю вам будет интересно поиграть с вашим другом в кооперативе. :)
Because classic means classic, there is not much to add about Portal 2 (and Portal series in general), except that it is a must-have and an inevitable art masterpiece !
ive played through this game at least like 4 times and ill probaly do it a few more before i die

Chariots Chariots. Portal 2 is the more slightly-more-beloved of my two favorite games of all time, coming in just ahead of the original Portal. I have never played a game so far that can match it's sense of atmosphere. Through stunning visuals and set-design, an innovative soundtrack, and an over-arching dedication to quality, Valve left me begging for more. Infinite Testing Initiative is a start, but we're eventually gonna need more games. And even more Cave Johnson.

Was reluctant to ever play this game, thinking that it would never be as good as the first one.. Two years after it came out, I decided to give it a shot and I'm really pissed off at myself for doing so earlier. It almost supercedes the original in many ways. While Portal was thrown together as a side project from Valve, you can tell that with Portal 2 they gave it the time, money and finesse that it deserved in development.

Grade: 98/100
Difficulty: Ranging from easy to very difficult depending on chapter or aspect of the game. Timing, geometry and choices can change outcomes.
Pros: Very engaging dialogue and environment; fantastic storyline; co-op robotic mayhem; user-created maps for continued challenge and gameplay; Cave Johnson.
Cons: Co-op mode does not like me and/or is cursed. I may never complete co-op testing!
Replayable: Yes, yes, yes. There's always something you didn't catch before.
Must have!
A must play

Portal 2 is an amazing puzzle game that continues where Portal left off. The challenges are pretty fun with interesting new concepts introduced such as the gels and light bridges. The story is also quite interesting and they created an entire backstory for Aperture Science and how GLaDOS came to be.

Co-op mode is also well designed encouraging teamwork and communication. I cannot count the number of times my friend and I killed each other in the most hilarious manners by accident. 

The only gripe I have with the game is the lack of cake. (Oh and lack of replayability)
Прикольная игрулька)
This probably goes without saying but Portal2 is beautiful, challenging, thoughtful, humorous, and put together like no other game.

Отличная игра, отлично совмещающая (как ни странно!) сторилайн и головоломки. Отличные персонажи! Несмотря на то, что их всего лишь двое, они замечательны. А мультиплеер весьма органично вписан в сторилайн и является продолжением сингл-кампании. Более того, сингл и мультиплеер воспринимаются как нечто цельное, и от этого пройти мультиплеер хочется так же сильно, как и сингл. Рекомендую игру не только любителям загадок, хотя бы попробуйте, вряд ли оторвётесь. :)
An amazing sequel to an amazing game, has some comedy, but for some people it might just refuse to launch after a while, me included.

A huge step from last game. Here you have more than everything: good lines, interesting story (and backstory), challenginf puzzles and GLaDOS. Also, they say the co-op is extremely good too. PS: Ending theme is great, again.
Great story, beat it in 7 hours.. not trying, but great game

This game is the very definition of awesome. What's even more awesome is that I got this during the summer sale for $9.99, saving me half of my Steam card. The story manages to be both hilarious and serious (but mostly hilarious). If someone were to ask me who was my favorite character, I wouldn't know where to start! Wheatley would have to be the worlds greatest moron for his horrible ideas and hilarious frantic personality. Not only is GLaDOS's name fun to type, but there has never been a better villain/antihero/AI. But Cave Johnson would have to be one of my favorites. He's the only supporting character who doesn't hate you or try to kill you, mainly because he's already dead! Also, his attempts to do anything legal or illegal for science make's his character even more likeable. Ok, back to the game. Even when your done with the singleplayer and co-op stories, there is still so much to do! The Perpetual Testing Initiative allows you to create your own test chamber (which might end up crappy) and upload it to the workshop for all to test it! This also gives you an Apperture nametag with your Steam profile pic to make it look like you work at Apperture. Also, you can here quotes from Cave Johnson (who, in this multiverse, is alive (another reason I love him)) whenever you start a community test. Cave's quote and the Apperture name tag make you feel like your an actual part of the story. This game is a 10/10.
Brilliant in both single player and coop!
Polecam
Soo many puzzles, onen of the best games I've ever played. Endless puzzles can be found online. AMAZING!
Отличная компания. Превосходный кооператив, безконечная игра. Все изза редактора карт всем советую 10/10.
